    public interface IJSRuleDmlModel<A extends JSRuleAction<A,? extends JSRuleFunctions>,S extends edi.rule.core.JSRuleService<A>>
extends IJSRuleCrudModel<A,S>
    版本:
    1.0.0

    所有dml操作模型的顶级接口，它实现了crud模型

    作者:
    zhongsheng
